Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add retailer reservation order management and bulk order features

- Order model: add order_type, is_reservation, bulk_order fields
- Retailer reservation list: view pending reservation orders with product aggregation
- Retailer reservation close: aggregate and create bulk order to wholesaler
- Retailer bulk order list: view order history to wholesaler
- Retailer wholesaler products: search and order products from wholesaler
- Retailer bulk cart: cart system for bulk ordering
- Updated retailer dashboard with new menu items

EOF
)")
